title: Sasaki to Miyano
synopsis: Miyano spends his days peacefully reading Boys' Love comics and worrying about how girly his face is-until a chance encounter leads to a scuffle with his senior Sasaki. Intrigued by his feisty junior Miyano, delinquent Sasaki uses every opportunity he can to get closer...
characters: ['Sasaki, Shuumei', 'Miyano, Yoshikazu', 'Hirano, Taiga', 'Kuresawa, Tasuku', 'Hanzawa, Masato', 'Tashiro, Gonzaburou', 'Ogasawara, Jirou']
voices: ['Shirai, Yuusuke', 'Saitou, Souma', 'Matsuoka, Yoshitsugu', 'Arai, Ryouhei', 'Uchida, Yuuma', 'Ichiki, Mitsuhiro', 'Ono, Yuuki']
